# rNodal

The goal of rNodal is to provide nodal analysis for oil and gas wells.

## Installation

You can install rNodal from github with:

```{r gh-installation, eval = FALSE}
# install.packages("devtools")
devtools::install_github("f0nzie/rNodal")
```
